attributes.action: Scrap The Personal Capability Assessment As It's Biased Towards Certain Illnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am asking the government to scrap the personal capability assessment (PA) for incapacity benefit as it is biased towards certain illnesses and means for people like me who have had some effects on their health because of their illness, we can't work but according to the PCA, there's nothing wrong with us and we are capable of working.
